title: Fugitive crypto king Do Kwon handed over to the FBI to answer for $40 billion stablecoin collapse

title: Fidelity Crypto Industry and Digital Payments ETF (NASDAQ:FDIG) Announces $0.01 Dividend
description: Fidelity Crypto Industry and Digital Payments ETF (NASDAQ:FDIG – Get Free Report) declared a dividend on Monday, December 30th,NASDAQ Dividends reports.
